initial_expr: ∀ (a : Array Nat) (k : Nat) (s : SlidingWindow.WindowState a k) (l : Nat) (hlLower : s.left ≤ l) (hlUpper : l < s.shrinkUntilValid.val.left), SlidingWindow.subarraySum a l s.shrinkUntilValid.val.right > k

proof_steps.tactic: intro a k s l hlLower hlUpper
induction s.right - s.left using Nat.strongRecOn generalizing s l with | ind n ih => ?_
generalize hRes : s.shrinkUntilValid = res at hlUpper ⊢

tactic_history: intro a k s l hlLower hlUpper
induction s.right - s.left using Nat.strongRecOn generalizing s l with | ind n ih => ?_
generalize hRes : s.shrinkUntilValid = res at hlUpper ⊢

variables.name: ih
variables.type:
∀ m < n,
  ∀ (s : SlidingWindow.WindowState a k) (l : ℕ),
    s.left ≤ l → l < (↑s.shrinkUntilValid).left → SlidingWindow.subarraySum a l (↑s.shrinkUntilValid).right > k

variables.name: res
variables.type: { s' // (s'.sum ≤ k ∨ s'.left = s'.right) ∧ s'.right = s.right }
